messages.message:
Also - there’s a sisyphean loop happening in converse, I wonder if anyone else has this issue:
As a user, I want to go to chat and find a conversation to resume.
But I often don’t remember to name my conversations (also I’ve see new users not know that you can rename conversations)
so when I look at the homepage, I don’t know which conversation it is that I want to resume.
So I click `create` - because it’s a _Primary button in the UI_
But this creates a new Convo
which means there’s lots of Conversation 1, 2,3,4,5… on my homepage and in the sidebar.

*Solution IMO*: we need to reinstate a Converse App button someone at the top of the homepage.
Check out the UAT environment, the design team made some changes already that address this feedback https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/
